hero.title: Cargo Transportation in Russia and CIS
hero.description: Safe and reliable delivery of your cargo anywhere in the world with a guarantee

companyInfo.title: COMPANY NAME
companyInfo.description: The logistics company 'OUR CONTINENT' was founded in 2018. For 8 years we have been working in this field and transporting oversized cargo across Russia and CIS countries. We have everything necessary for this responsible and complex work. Our main goals are timely delivery of cargo from point A to point B while maintaining the quality and integrity of the transported goods. Quality, punctuality and responsibility are our key skills.

items: We offer faster delivery times than companies with warehouses
Cargo remains undamaged as we avoid warehouse reloading
Our company works with partial loads and dedicated trucks, depending on the client's needs
We work on a contractual basis and offer any convenient payment method

calculator.title: Calculate the cost
calculator.subtitle: of cargo transportation
calculator.description: Submit your request and our manager will call you back
calculator.agreement: By clicking the button I agree to the processing of my personal data
